text: For without the vision to serve the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your might the problem of life cannot be solved. Therefore shall ye lay up these my words in your heart and in your soul. The text adds and in your soul, searching your soul.
handwritten_text: For without the vision to serve the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your might the problem of life cannot be solved. Therefore shall ye lay up these my words in your heart and in your soul. The text adds and in your soul, searching your soul.
